attributes.action: Ringfence all monies received from Petrol Tax and Vehicle excise tax to ensure that it is spent 100% on highways, footpaths and transport to benefit those paying for it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Billions of pounds are taken from the British public every year in Petrol and vehicle Excise tax, I propose that all these monies are ring fenced so that they are spent 100% on highways, footpaths and transport to benefit the people paying for it.
